scripts.clean:reports: npx rimraf allure-results allure-report test-results playwright-report
scripts.test:smoke:chrome: HEADLESS=true npm run clean:reports && HEADLESS=true npx playwright test --project=chromium --reporter=allure-playwright -g smoke
scripts.test:regression:chrome: HEADLESS=true npm run clean:reports && HEADLESS=true npx playwright test --project=chromium --reporter=allure-playwright -g regression
scripts.test:smoke:chrome:headed: npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test --project=chromium --headed --reporter=allure-playwright -g smoke
scripts.test:regression:chrome:headed: npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test --project=chromium --headed --reporter=allure-playwright -g regression
